msItemStruct.note: Another fragment belonging to (14) is perhaps 3708 (9)

supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-14 (in mm), (1) 22 x 24, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (2) 36 x 32, (A) 6 lines, no margin, (B) blank, (3) 37 x 19, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 29 x 15, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 36 x 15, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin (?), (B) blank, (6) 30 x 28, (A) 4 lines, no margins, upside down (?), (B) blank, (7) 56 x 32, (A) 5 lines, right margin (?), (B) blank, (8) 52 x 53, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (9) 60 x 60, (A) 4 lines, right bottom margin, (B) blank, (10) 36 x 61, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 70 x 43, (A) 5 lines (?), top margin, (B) blank, (12) 50 x 60, (A) 3 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (13) 63 x 64, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) 1 line, (14) 85 x 49, (A) 10 lines, right margin, (B) blank

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
